system.description:
"Endure battle's storm with woven resilience."

Gain +3/+3 to Major / Severe damage thresholds. You can only have 1 Subdermal weave enhancement, but they can be upgraded.

Subdermal weave Mk.III.description:
"Endure battle's storm with woven resilience."

Gain +3/+3 to Major / Severe damage thresholds. You can only have 1 Subdermal weave enhancement, but they can be upgraded.
Subdermal weave Mk.III.name: Subdermal weave Mk.III
